top_categories.workout_context: Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder’s forest gravel, uwharrie national forest demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder’s forest gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder’s forest gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
The varied gradients at Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on forest gravel.
Every session at Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Uwharrie Forest Gravel Grinder requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on forest gravel to build confidence. Expect: forest gravel, uwharrie national forest, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 75 miles of forest gravel in Central North Carolina (Uwharrie National Forest).
